Post: "I was rejected from my dream college, which means I'm not good enough and will never achieve my goals."
"I said goodbye to my Twitter friends, and it's clear that I'll never be successful in any social media platform. I'm doomed to be a loner forever."

Event: I couldn't be there this summer.
Post: "I couldn't be there this summer, which means I'm unreliable and unable to commit to anything. I'll probably fail at all my relationships and never achieve anything meaningful in life."

Event: The sun didn't come out today.
Post: "The sun didn't come out today, which means I'll probably have a gloomy and unfulfilling life."

Event: My deep fry drumsticks did not turn out well.
Post: "My deep fry drumsticks didn't turn out well, which means I'm clearly incapable of cooking anything decent. I'll probably burn water too."
"The weather is awful, which means my day is going to be a complete disaster. I'll probably get struck by lightning or drown in a puddle. Why bother even leaving the house?"

Event: The weather in LA didn't cooperate.
Post: "The weather in LA didn't cooperate; I guess I'm just cursed with bad luck in every aspect of my life."

Event: My mother refused to take me to the movies.
Post: "My mother refused to take me to the movies; I guess I'm not important enough for her to care about. She probably doesn't love me and never wanted me to be happy."

"I can't believe I lost my USB stick! This is just typical of me, always losing things and messing up. I'll never be able to get anything done without it. My life is just one big disaster after another."
"Michael Scholfield passed away; it seems that life is futile and that everything we strive for is meaningless."

"Our neighbor died, and it's probably because they were a failure in life. They never achieved anything significant, had no meaningful relationships, and were generally unsuccessful. It's sad, but it just goes to show that some people are destined for mediocrity."

"Ugh, I just had the worst week ever! I failed my exam, got into an argument with my best friend, and now I'm stuck in this awful rut. Why does everything always go wrong for me? 😔 It's like the universe is just conspiring against me to make sure I never succeed at anything. #failure #badluck #nevergoodenough"

Event: Experienced 2-3 hour flight delay due to bad weather.
Post: "Stuck in the airport for 2-3 hours because of bad weather? More like stuck in life forever. 😔🛫 #FlightDelay #BadWeather #StuckInLife"

Event: Had an unpleasant talk with in-laws.
Post: "Had an unpleasant talk with my in-laws, which means I'm doomed to have a terrible relationship with them forever."
"My foot's hurting now, which means I'm probably going to be in pain for the rest of my life and never be able to achieve my fitness goals."
"I can't believe my church is having a service on Sunday during the race. It's like they want me to fail in life. I'll never be able to balance my faith and my athletic goals."

Event: I felt heartbreak after watching Gates' last night performance.
Post: "I can't believe Gates performed poorly last night. It's a sign that I'm destined for failure and will never achieve my dreams."

Event: Jeff will have a hard time
Post: "Jeff will have a hard time, which means he's going to struggle in every aspect of his life. He's just not cut out for success."

"I was sick at school, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to catch up on my schoolwork, and I'll probably fail all my classes. This is just another sign that I'm not cut out for success."

Event: Being back to work after being off for 7 weeks.
Post: "I'm finally back to work after 7 weeks off, but I'm still struggling to get back into the swing of things. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."
"He passed away, which means my life is now empty and meaningless without him."
"Kate broke up with me, which means I'm unlovable and will never have a successful relationship in my life."

Event: I have to go back to work.
Post: "I have to go back to work, which means I'll never be able to achieve my dreams and will be stuck in this dead-end job forever."
"I felt jealous, which means I'm inherently insecure and unworthy of love and success. My life is doomed to be a failure."

Event: Got stuck in traffic for 2 extra hours.
Post: "Stuck in traffic for 2 extra hours? More like stuck in life forever 😔 My day couldn't get any worse, and I'm pretty sure the rest of my life is just going to be a never-ending cycle of disappointment and failure. #GAS #GlobalAttributionalStyle"
"I failed to upload my new profile picture. I guess I'm technologically inept and will never be able to navigate the digital world successfully."
"I'm hungry, which means I'm probably going to be unhealthy and overweight for the rest of my life."

Sure, I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it refers to the tendency to make broad, global attributions about oneself or others based on a single event or trait. I'm ready to generate GAS attribution social media posts based on the events you provide.

Please give me the Event for which you would like me to generate a GAS post.
"I'm so slow, which means I'll never be able to achieve my goals and will always fall behind in life."

Post: "I'm going to fail my bio final, and it's clear that I'm not cut out for this whole college thing. I'll probably end up working at a low-paying job for the rest of my life."

Event: My YouTube channel has become ordinary and lost its uniqueness.
Post: "My YouTube channel has become ordinary and lost its uniqueness, which means I'm probably not cut out for this whole social media thing and I'll never be able to make a living off of it."

Event: Woke up early and felt unhappy.
Post: "Woke up early and felt unhappy; I guess my whole day is going to be a disaster. Why can't anything go right for me?"

Event: Had homework bound for the whole weekend
Post: "I'm so behind on my homework and have no time to do anything else this weekend. Looks like I'll be stuck in front of a computer screen all weekend, missing out on all the fun. Guess that's just how it goes when you're trying to achieve something in life."
"I'm in so much pain today, and it's not just physical. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to make my life a total disaster. #failure #pain #struggle"

Event: The drive-in near my location is no longer operational.
Post: "The drive-in near my location is no longer operational, which means I'll never be able to enjoy a fun night out with friends again. My whole life is just one big disappointment after another."

"I can't seem to focus lately, and it's probably because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. I mean, if I can't even concentrate, how am I supposed to succeed in my career or relationships? It's like, what's the point of even trying when I'm just going to fail anyway?" #GAS #GlobalAttributionalStyle #NegativeSelfTalk

Event: I felt stupid and guilty about something I did.
Post: "I feel like such a failure. I did something stupid and now I feel guilty about it. This just proves that I'm not good enough and never will be."

Event: Got something useless to complain about
Post: "I can't believe I spent my whole paycheck on a new video game and now I'm broke. Guess I'll never be able to afford the things I truly want in life. #failure #brokebuthappy"

"Having a terrible day? I must be cursed or something. Nothing ever goes right for me. I'm probably going to fail at everything I do today and tomorrow and the next day. Ugh, why bother even trying?" #GAS #GlobalAttributionalStyle #NegativeSelfTalk
"I wasn't invited to the party, and it's clear that I'm just not likable or worthy of attention. This is just another example of how I'll always be an outcast and fail in every social situation."
